translations: und als er sie gegessen hatte, wurde sein Mund ganz bitter von ihrem Geschmack

Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: mayər xálaṣ, laybi samne mede, u=samo šaġəl b-i=laš-ayḏe kula
translations: ‘He has already become intoxicated, there is nothing I can do, the venom has affected his whole body’ LuF 294/29;

Infectum.turoyo: hən m-až=žabaš-ani ko-nəfqi mayire m-u=sabab d-kowe nizalat b-gawayee an=nizalat-ani yaʕni ab=buzarʕe ko-yoʕən b-gawe d-až=žabaš edi ko-mayri
translations: ‘Some of the watermelons grow bitter, because of the “nizalat” that are inside them. Those “nizalat” are seeds that spring inside the watermelons and then become bitter’ 94/71;
